title: Blackadder the Third
plot: In the Regency era, Mr E. Blackadder serves as butler to the foppish numskull Prince George amidst the fads and crazes of the time.
awards: Top rated TV #134 | Won 1 BAFTA Award, 3 wins & 6 nominations total
stars: Rowan Atkinson, Tony Robinson, Hugh Laurie
